original_text: But he did not stay in Nazareth. He went to live in Capernaum, which is a town on the shore of Lake Galilee. It was in the part of Israel called Zebulun and Naphtali.
korean_text: 나사렛을 떠나 스불론과 납달리 지경 해변에 있는 가버나움에 가서 사시니

sentences.original_text: But he did not stay in Nazareth.
He went to live in Capernaum,
which is a town on the shore of Lake Galilee.
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 갈릴리 호수 기슭에 있는 마을입니다.

sentences.original_text: It was in the part of Israel
